Currated by me. A collection of my thougths and resources I’d like to come back to. Hopefully you do to!


This blog is open source. See an error? Please go ahead and propose a change on github issues or email.


The site is developed using Jekyll, and hosted on github pages. With some technical knowledge you can manage and host your own website. I’d love to help you with this!
